comment: Content is owned by produser and licensed to CNN
Not really. The TOS gives CNN power to redistribute and repurposed (worldwide and in perpetuity) any materials uploaded.  (http://ireport.cnn.com/terms.jspa)
Terms of use allow CNN to use your content in any way they see fit...IF they give your content to a third party as a stand alone piece, then they will pay you a portion of their licensing agreement.
